title: How to find home buyers online - Anything From Anywhere - Quora

response.answer_text: You can post the add in Facebook marketplace, olx, and sites like this, if you are planning for free or limited advertising. Without advertising, it will be difficult. For paid advertising, you can go for print media or electronic media. Examples of print media can be various newspapers, brochures, catalogues, books, magazines. Electronic media can be various social media sites, Google ads. You need to explore more. Good luck
